001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
004import org.hamcrest.Matcher;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.Reader;
009import java.io.StringReader;
010import java.io.StringWriter;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Optional;
014
015import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.is;
016import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.not;
017import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
018import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
019
020public class D2LGradesCSVParserTest {
021
022  @Test
023  public void ignoreExpectedColumns() throws IOException {
024    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
025
026    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Calculated Final Grade Numerator"), is(true));
027    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Calculated Final Grade Denominator"), is(true));
028    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Adjusted Final Grade Numerator"), is(true));
029    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Adjusted Final Grade Denominator"), is(true));
030    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("End-of-Line Indicator"), is(true));
031  }
032
033  @Test
034  public void doNotIgnoreNonIgnoredColumns() throws IOException {
035    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
036
037    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Username"), is(false));
038    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("First Name"), is(false));
039    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Last Name"), is(false));
040    assertThat(parser.isColumnIgnored("Email"), is(false));
041  }
042
043  @Test
044  public void canParseCsvWithNoStudents() throws IOException {
045    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createEmptyCsv().getReader());
046    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
047    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasSize(0));
048  }
049
050  @Test
051  public void usernameIsFirstColumn() throws IOException {
052    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
053    assertThat(parser.getUsernameColumn(), equalTo(0));
054  }
055
056  @Test
057  public void lastNameIsSecondColumn() throws IOException {
058    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
059    assertThat(parser.getLastNameColumn(), equalTo(1));
060  }
061
062  @Test
063  public void firstNameIsThirdColumn() throws IOException {
064    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
065    assertThat(parser.getFirstNameColumn(), equalTo(2));
066  }
067
068  @Test
069  public void emailIsFourthColumn() throws IOException {
070    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
071    assertThat(parser.getEmailColumn(), equalTo(3));
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  public void expectedQuizNames() throws IOException {
076    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
077    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), hasItem("Programming Background Quiz"));
078    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), hasItem("Java Language and OOP Quiz"));
079    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), hasItem("Language API Quiz"));
080  }
081
082  @Test
083  public void quizNameDoNotContainIgnoredColumns() throws IOException {
084    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
085
086    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Calculated Final Grade Numerator")));
087    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Calculated Final Grade Denominator")));
088    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Adjusted Final Grade Numerator")));
089    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Adjusted Final Grade Denominator")));
090    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Adjusted Final Grade Denominator")));
091    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("End-of-Line Indicator")));
092  }
093
094
095  @Test
096  public void studentInformationIsNotConsideredAQuiz() throws IOException {
097    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
098
099    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Username")));
100    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("First Name")));
101    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Last Name")));
102    assertThat(parser.getQuizNames(), not(hasItem("Email")));
103  }
104
105  @Test
106  public void gradesPopulatedWithStudents() throws IOException {
107    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
108
109    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
110    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithFirstName("Student"));
111    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithLastName("One"));
112    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithD2LId("student1"));
113  }
114
115  @Test
116  public void gradesPopulatedWithStudents2() throws IOException {
117    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
118
119    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
120    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithFirstName("Student"));
121    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithLastName("Two"));
122    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithD2LId("student2"));
123  }
124
125  @Test
126  public void gradesPopulatedWithScores() throws IOException {
127    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
128
129    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
130    Optional<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent> student = getStudentWithId("student1", grades);
131    assertThat("Could not find student", student.isPresent(), is(true));
132    assertThat(student.get().getScore("Programming Background Quiz"), equalTo(4.0));
133  }
134
135  @Test
136  public void gradesPopulatedWithScores2() throws IOException {
137    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(createCsv().getReader());
138
139    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
140    Optional<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent> student = getStudentWithId("student2", grades);
141    assertThat("Could not find student", student.isPresent(), is(true));
142    assertThat(student.get().getScore("Programming Background Quiz"), equalTo(3.0));
143  }
144
145  private java.util.Optional<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent> getStudentWithId(String d2lId, GradesFromD2L grades) {
146    return grades.getStudents().stream().filter(s -> s.getD2lId().equals(d2lId)).findAny();
147  }
148
149  private Matcher<? super List<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent>> hasStudentWithD2LId(String d2lId) {
150    return new D2LStudentPropertyMatcher(GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent::getD2lId, "d2l id", d2lId);
151  }
152
153  private Matcher<? super List<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent>> hasStudentWithFirstName(String firstName) {
154    return new D2LStudentPropertyMatcher(GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent::getFirstName, "first name", firstName);
155  }
156
157  private Matcher<? super List<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent>> hasStudentWithLastName(String lastName) {
158    return new D2LStudentPropertyMatcher(GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent::getLastName, "last name", lastName);
159  }
160
161  private CSV createCsv() {
162    CSV csv = createEmptyCsv();
163    csv.addLine("student1","One","Student","student1@email.com","4","","","","","","4","24","","","");
164    csv.addLine("student2","Two","Student","student2@email.com","3","","","","","","4","24","","","");
165    return csv;
166  }
167
168  private CSV createEmptyCsv() {
169    CSV csv = new CSV();
170    csv.addLine("Username", "Last Name", "First Name", "Email", "Programming Background Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Java Language and OOP Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Language API Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Java IO and Collections Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Web and REST Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Google Web Toolkit Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>", "Calculated Final Grade Numerator", "Calculated Final Grade Denominator", "Adjusted Final Grade Numerator", "Adjusted Final Grade Denominator", "End-of-Line Indicator");
171    return csv;
172  }
173
174  private class CSV {
175    List<List<String>> lines = Lists.newArrayList();
176    public void addLine(String... cells) {
177      lines.add(Arrays.asList(cells));
178    }
179
180    public Reader getReader() {
181      StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
182      for (List<String> line : lines) {
183        for (String cell : line) {
184          writer.write(cell);
185          writer.write(",");
186        }
187        writer.write("\n");
188      }
189
190      return new StringReader(writer.toString());
191    }
192  }
193
194  @Test
195  public void guestStudentIsIgnored() throws IOException {
196    CSV csv = createEmptyCsv();
197    csv.addLine("guest1234","Two","Student","student2@email.com","3","","","","","","4","24","","","");
198
199    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(csv.getReader());
200
201    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
202    Optional<GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent> student = getStudentWithId("guest1234", grades);
203    assertThat(student.isPresent(), equalTo(false));
204  }
205
206  @Test
207  public void poundSignAtStartOfUsernameIsIgnored() throws IOException {
208    CSV csv = createEmptyCsv();
209    csv.addLine("#student1","One","Student","student1@email.com","4","","","","","","4","24","","","");
210    csv.addLine("student2","Two","Student","student2@email.com","3","","","","","","4","24","","","");
211
212    D2LGradesCSVParser parser = new D2LGradesCSVParser(csv.getReader());
213
214    GradesFromD2L grades = parser.getGrades();
215    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithD2LId("student1"));
216    assertThat(grades.getStudents(), hasStudentWithD2LId("student2"));
217  }
218
219  // No students
220  // No assignments
221  // No grades
222  // Some missing grades
223}
